title: Xayah&Rakan Gifting Icon Never recieved
body: I gifted one of my friends the champion Xayah during the promotion, but never got the icon you are supposed to get. {{item:3151}}

replies.body: As I understand it, most of these icons have been distributed to eligible players.  If you haven't received yours yet, don't worry!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can figure out what happened!  We'll see you there!
Update!  I was able to verify eligibility, so I went ahead and added the icon personally.  :D

I have the same problem with the Demacia Icon X: 
I already contacted the support via a ticket and it was said that I can't get it anymore - even though I have claimed it / clicked the thing etc. I am 100% sure D:

It makes me kinda sad - but my question is: what could be the reason why it didn't got registered that I claimed it?

The Demacia icon was available for a limited period, and the site gave players a short period to reach out to us if they hadn't received their icon yet.  If you have a screenshot of your redemption on the site, we might be able to use it.  Otherwise, there's not much more we can unless the icons make a return at some point in the future.  Sorry about that.  :/  It's possible that if it was claimed, it may have been while on another account (something that's happened to me before!).

I hope this okay : https://puu.sh/vKXLt/ed94f0ea84.jpg

It is cropped because I have my skype open on the right side of the screen - no bodies business X:


Bonus : https://puu.sh/vKYd6/b73a0d2190.jpg 

I got the last icons D: 

Have every Region Icon since the Freljord Event in S3 x: 

And yes I was too late with my support ticket orz - just saw it - send my ticket on may 3rd

Nice!  If possible, show a little more of the top right so it reveals your summoner name as well.  We prefer to look at each case individually, so get back to us again in  a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see what we can do.

This is an old screen ;A; how can I show you the top thing? I know what you mean - the top black bar - with login etc summoner name , boards etc. 

Is it okay if I take a screen with my browser, the page and my client open? 

This is the only thing I think that would show that it is rly me.
